amendment.description: To provide additional funding for part B of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 71 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 71 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S1195-1199; text: CR S1195) To provide additional funding for part B of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 71 proposed by Senator Dodd.
